rows.label: qst200819_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Chepaan, you need to
take it easy sometimes!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0002
rows.name:
That's easy to say, but...
This research is...so important...

rows.label: qst200819_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, can you put it down for a minute?
I wanted to tell you something.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0004
rows.name:
...Well, all right.
I suppose a minute won't hurt.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0005
rows.name:
Okay then, well, I'll try to make it quick!
Here's the thing...

rows.label: qst200819_msg0006
rows.name:
Right, so you're trying to save the
Saffronia tree?

rows.label: qst200819_msg0007
rows.name:
I can't help you with the tree brace,
sadly. But fungicide and antidesiccant
are definitely my territory.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0008
rows.name:
Great!
I knew we could count on you, Chepaan!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0009
rows.name: Well, don't count your chickens, child.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0010
rows.name:
I want to help you, really I do, but
I'm currently out of some essential
reagents...

rows.label: qst200819_msg0011
rows.name:
Huh?
Oh, you don't have what you need...?

rows.label: qst200819_msg0012
rows.name: Please, don't be so crestfallen, Hotaru-chan.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0013
rows.name:
I can make as much medicine
as you need if you bring me the
ingredients!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0014
rows.name: How does that sound?

rows.label: qst200819_msg0015
rows.name:
...Okay, that sounds like a deal.
Thank you, Chepaan!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0016
rows.name: Anytime, Hotaru-chan! Anytime.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0017
rows.name: Right, so what is it that you need?

rows.label: qst200819_msg0018
rows.name: First, for the fungicide...

rows.label: qst200819_msg0019
rows.name:
Five Olsteprinium flowers
and five Frozen Sapphires.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0020
rows.name: And for the antidesiccant...

rows.label: qst200819_msg0021
rows.name:
Three Amber Leaves
and ten Ghost Dudleya plants.

rows.label: qst200819_msg0022
rows.name:
Got it, thanks!
We'll get you what you need!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0023
rows.name: Just be careful out there!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0024
rows.name:
Chepaan is a good man, pure
and simple!

rows.label: qst200819_msg0025
rows.name: Okay, let's go get those ingredients!
